thread.section_title: Goldcar opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Goldcar | www.goldcar.com | 13 de 684
thread.title: Arek

author: Arek
title: Arek
text:
Fast rental process, good car. I had a key'n'go option and it was really fast.
The only problem was with return process. I was informed that if I return a car before 8:00 I can use a key return box in the main terminal (Catania). Unfortunately I did not find it and nobody in the terminal knew where it is. Lucy for me it was just before 8:00 so I was able to go back to the parking and return key to the staff who just arrived.
